news.title: Prince Harry meets King Charles for first time in more than a year
news.summary: There had been no face to face meeting between father and son since February 2024.

news.title: More embarrassing Epstein exchanges to come, says Mandelson, as Starmer pressed at PMQs
news.summary: The UK's ambassador to the US likens his past association with the convicted paedophile to "an albatross around my neck".

news.title: Teacher who hid with child from Southport killer feels 'crushing guilt'
news.summary: Speaking publicly for the first time, dance teacher Heidi Liddle says she feels "crushing guilt".

news.title: Life on Mars? 'Leopard-spot' rocks could be biggest clue yet
news.summary: Unusual mudstones found on the Red Planet are potentially associated with ancient Martian microbes.

news.title: No 10 files raise questions over whether Tory donations were legal
news.summary: A foreign billionaire who met then-PM Boris Johnson at Downing Street was described in an official log as a "donor".

news.title: Trump is used to shaking off criticism - but the Epstein story is different
news.summary: While there is no suggestion of criminal wrongdoing by Trump, the political consequences of the Epstein saga on the US president are very real

news.title: Banksy mural scrubbed from Royal Courts of Justice
news.summary: The artwork of a judge hitting a protester with a gavel has been removed from the listed building.

news.title: Watch: Footage shows second claimed attack on Greta Thunberg Gaza flotilla
news.summary: BBC Verify analyses footage of the suspected drone attacks and images of a device found after the incident.

news.title: Larry Ellison tops Elon Musk as world's richest person
news.summary: The Oracle cofounder's wealth has overtaken Musk's fortune, propelled by an AI boom.

news.title: Weleda investigates claims cream was tested on Nazi camp prisoners
news.summary: A new study alleges the skincare brand's product was used for human experiments by a Nazi doctor.
